author: alx9r
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

### unrelated.ps1
```powershell
# empty powershell file that is never invoked
```

### repro.ps1
```powershell
Get-PSBreakpoint | Remove-PSBreakpoint

Add-Type @'
public class T
{
    public T(){}
}
'@

function a { [T]::new() }
function b {}

function c
{
    [T[]]$a = a
    [T[]]$b = b
    [pscustomobject]@{
        m = ($a+$b)
    }
}

c
Set-PSBreakpoint $PSScriptRoot\unrelated.ps1 -Line 2 | Out-Null
c
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

Either
```none
m         
-         
{T, $null}
{T, $null}
```
or

```none
m         
-         
{T}
{T}
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
m         
-         
{T, $null}
{T}       
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value                                            
----                           -----                                            
PSVersion                      6.0.0-rc                                         
PSEdition                      Core                                             
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-rc                                        
OS                             Microsoft Windows 6.3.9600                       
Platform                       Win32NT                                          
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                          
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                              
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                          
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                              
```
title: Setting unrelated breakpoint changes return value of parameterless pure function.
